dict.acceptation: 传说，传言；（尤指充满惊险的）故事；坏话，谣言；〈古〉计算，总计；

sent.orig: Around the campfire they would narrate tale after tale.
sent.trans: 他们围坐在营火旁说故事。

sent.orig: The Seven are sisters, or sometimes brothers, whose names vary from tale to tale.
sent.trans: 七贤有时是一些姐妹，有时又是一些兄弟，他们的名字在故事间变来变去。

sent.orig: More recently, financial innovations were peddled on a tale of decreased risk through financial engineering.
sent.trans: 最近的这一次，金融创新被推上了神坛，通过金融工程的设计，它可以减少风险。

sent.orig: I will become nursery tale in.
sent.trans: 我将成为幼儿园的故事中。

sent.orig: I give a full account here, because the tale is at least a diplomatic curiosity.
sent.trans: 我把全部经过写下来，因为这段故事至少可算是外交上的奇闻。
